mapper.sql: id, device_id, temperature, rain_fall, pressure, humidity, wind_direction, wind_speed, irradiance, create_time
mapper.insert: insert into meteorological_data (id, device_id, temperature, rain_fall, pressure, humidity, wind_direction, wind_speed, irradiance, create_time) values (#{id,jdbcType=OTHER}, #{deviceId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{temperature,jdbcType=REAL}, #{rainFall,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{pressure,jdbcType=REAL}, #{humidity,jdbcType=REAL}, #{windDirection,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{windSpeed,jdbcType=REAL}, #{irradiance,jdbcType=REAL}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})

update meteorological_data
device_id = #{deviceId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
temperature = #{temperature,jdbcType=REAL},
rain_fall = #{rainFall,jdbcType=INTEGER},
pressure = #{pressure,jdbcType=REAL},

wind_speed = #{windSpeed,jdbcType=REAL},
irradiance = #{irradiance,jdbcType=REAL},
create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=OTHER}
